comments: Jed is an extremely smart guy. Intro to Linguistics is no joke, don\'t take it just for GE. You need to buy the book, you use it every day. His lectures are straightforward and every slide is important, which is nice. His tests are VERY hard, but I managed to get an A in the class since he drops one test grade. If you like language, take this!!
HORRIBLE TEACHER!!!! NEVER TAKE HIM. 3 tests, one is dropped! 45% each. Doesn\'t care about you and will be glad to sign your withdrawal form. DO NOT TAKE THIS CLASS

A. his is not funny but thinks he\'s hysterical B. he is very annoying early in the morning C. i learned nothing of importance and failed the class becuase he failed to explain the material. DO NOT TAKE for your own good. beware

He\'s a FUN professor!. I may find the class a bit hard, but Jed just knows how to mdke it fun and somewhat understandable. I\'m currently taking Morphology with him, and once in a while, he lets us think "dirty\'!

My hardest class all year. He\'s really funny and pretty nice, but his tests are brutal and he is not as helpful as I would like. I don\'t recommend this class if you\'re taking it to fulfill a GE like me : [
